document_data.name: Rennyn Aelorothi
document_data.mainbody: '''Rennyn Aelorothi''' was a [[gold elf]] [[fighter]], [[wizard]], and [[thief]] and one of the best spies of [[Evermeet]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Rennyn was one of the most talented spies of Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]]. Often he went on missions to [[Faer√ªn]] and he usually disguised himself as a conjurer, a minstrel, or another kind of entertainer. Thanks to his [[magic]], he could appear with a different face each time.
document_data.Personality: For a mission's success, Rennyn was very able at faking friendship or interest to get familiar with someone. However, in truth, he had a frosty personality, being very insular and distant from others.
